subject: Soccer
Boycotts
lead_paragraph: A row among top players on Mexico’s national team and the country’s federation has escalated with the federation saying it will not bow to demands by 13 players who are threatening to boycott coming matches.
snippet: A row among top players on Mexico’s national team and the country’s federation has escalated with the federation saying it will not bow to demands by 13 players who are threatening to boycott coming matches.
